title: Early Lookahead to 2021 Free Agency, Tua says he's healthy, Aldon Smith to Cowboys (Football 4/3)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to catch up on what's happening in the NFL. The guys discuss Tua Tagovailoa's apparently healthy hip and where he will land in this month's draft (3:45), as well as the Patriots confidence in Jarrett Stidham (14:10), and the Cowboys adding a player who's been out of football since 2015 (24:00). The Pick Six Superfriends then take a look at 2021 free agency, evaluating the top players who may or may not make it to the market next offseason (33:00)

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: 2020 free agency is still ongoing, but it's never too early to look ahead to next year's class. The Pick Six Superfriends break down who's extension worthy and who might hit the market.
